groovyx.caelyf.routes
[Groovy] Class Route

java.lang.Object
  groovyx.caelyf.routes.Route

@ToString
class Route

Representation of a route URL mapping.

Authors:
Guillaume Laforge

Property Summary
int cacheExpiration

The time in seconds the resource to stay in memcache
String destination

The destination pattern when the route is matched
boolean ignore

Should a uri matching this route just be ignored?
HttpMethod method

The HTTP method used to reach that route
Closure namespace

Closure defining a namespace for the scope of the request
RedirectionType redirectionType

Whether we're doing a redirect or a forward to the new location
String route

The route pattern
 
Constructor Summary
Route(String route, String destination, HttpMethod method = HttpMethod.ALL, RedirectionType redirectionType = RedirectionType.FORWARD, Closure validator = null, Closure namespace = null, int cacheExpiration = 0, boolean ignore = false)

Constructor taking a route, a destination, an HTTP method (optional), a redirection type (optional), and a closure for validating the variables against regular expression patterns.

Method Detail

extractParameters

static List extractParameters(String route)
Extract a list of parameters in the route URI.

forUri

def forUri(HttpServletRequest request)
Checks whether a URI matches a route.
Returns:
a map with a 'matches' boolean key telling whether the route is matched and a variables key containing a map of the variable key and matched value.

transformRouteIntoRegex

static String transformRouteIntoRegex(String route)
Transform a route pattern into a proper regex pattern.
